card.name: Aura Blast
card.property: Destroy target enchantment. Draw a card.

card.name: Aurora Griffin
card.property: Flying {W}: Target permanent becomes white until end of turn.

card.name: Disciple of Kangee
card.property: {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying and becomes blue until end of turn.

card.name: Dominaria's Judgment
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain protection from white if you control a Plains, from blue if you control an Island, from black if you control a Swamp, from red if you control a Mountain, and from green if you control a Forest.

card.name: Guard Dogs
card.property: {2} {W}, {T}: Choose a permanent you control. Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn if it shares a color with that permanent.

card.name: Heroic Defiance
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 unless it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.

card.name: Hobble
card.property: Enchant creature When Hobble enters, draw a card. Enchanted creature can't attack. Enchanted creature can't block if it's black.

card.name: Honorable Scout
card.property: When Honorable Scout enters, you gain 2 life for each black and/or red creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Lashknife Barrier
card.property: When Lashknife Barrier enters, draw a card. If a source would deal damage to a creature you control, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature instead.

card.name: March of Souls
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Orim's Chant
card.property: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) Target player can't cast spells this turn. If this spell was kicked, creatures can't attack this turn.

card.name: Planeswalker's Mirth
card.property: {3} {W}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. You gain life equal to that card's mana value.

card.name: Pollen Remedy
card.property: Kicker—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose. If this spell was kicked, prevent the next 6 damage this way instead.

card.name: Samite Elder
card.property: {T}: Creatures you control gain protection from the colors of target permanent you control until end of turn.

card.name: Samite Pilgrim
card.property: Domain — {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Sunscape Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {2}{U} as you cast this spell.) When Sunscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, destroy target creature with flying. When Sunscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, draw two cards.

card.name: Sunscape Familiar
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Green spells and blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Surprise Deployment
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat. You may put a nonwhite creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to your hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Voice of All
card.property: Flying As Voice of All enters, choose a color. Voice of All has protection from the chosen color.

card.name: Allied Strategies
card.property: Domain — Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands they control.

card.name: Arctic Merfolk
card.property: Kicker—Return a creature you control to its owner's hand. (You may return a creature you control to its owner's hand in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) If Arctic Merfolk was kicked, it enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Confound
card.property: Counter target spell that targets a creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Dralnu's Pet
card.property: Kicker—{2}{B}, Discard a creature card. (You may pay {2}{B} and discard a creature card in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) If Dralnu's Pet was kicked, it enters with flying and with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the discarded card's mana value.

card.name: Ertai's Trickery
card.property: Counter target spell if it was kicked.

card.name: Escape Routes
card.property: {2} {U}: Return target white or black creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gainsay
card.property: Counter target blue spell.

card.name: Hunting Drake
card.property: Flying When Hunting Drake enters, put target red or green creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Planar Overlay
card.property: Each player chooses a land they control of each basic land type. Return those lands to their owners' hands.

card.name: Planeswalker's Mischief
card.property: {3} {U}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. If it's an instant or sorcery card, exile it. You may cast it without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled. At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast it, return it to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Rushing River
card.property: Kicker—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sea Snidd
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Shifting Sky
card.property: As Shifting Sky enters, choose a color. All nonland permanents are the chosen color.

card.name: Sisay's Ingenuity
card.property: Enchant creature When Sisay's Ingenuity enters, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{2}{U}: Target creature becomes the color of your choice until end of turn."

card.name: Sleeping Potion
card.property: Enchant creature When Sleeping Potion enters, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice Sleeping Potion.

card.name: Stormscape Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {W} and/or {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {W} and/or {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) When Stormscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, you gain 3 life. When Stormscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {2}{B} kicker, destroy target nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

card.name: Stormscape Familiar
card.property: Flying White spells and black spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Sunken Hope
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Waterspout Elemental
card.property: Kicker {U} (You may pay an additional {U} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Waterspout Elemental enters, if it was kicked, return all other creatures to their owners' hands and you skip your next turn.

card.name: Bog Down
card.property: Kicker—Sacrifice two lands. (You may sacrifice two lands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Target player discards two cards. If this spell was kicked, that player discards three cards instead.

card.name: Dark Suspicions
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player loses X life, where X is the number of cards in that player's hand minus the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Death Bomb
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Diabolic Intent
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Exotic Disease
card.property: Domain — Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Lord of the Undead
card.property: Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1. {1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Maggot Carrier
card.property: When Maggot Carrier enters, each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Morgue Toad
card.property: Sacrifice Morgue Toad: Add {U}{R}.

card.name: Nightscape Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {2}{U} and/or {2}{R} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} and/or {2}{R} as you cast this spell.) When Nightscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, return up to two target nonblack creatures to their owners' hands. When Nightscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, destroy target land.

card.name: Nightscape Familiar
card.property: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.

card.name: Noxious Vapors
card.property: Each player reveals their hand, chooses one card of each color from it, then discards all other nonland cards.

card.name: Phyrexian Bloodstock
card.property: When Phyrexian Bloodstock leaves the battlefield, destroy target white creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Phyrexian Scuta
card.property: Kicker—Pay 3 life. (You may pay 3 life in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) If Phyrexian Scuta was kicked, it enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Planeswalker's Scorn
card.property: {3} {B}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's mana value. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Shriek of Dread
card.property: Target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Sinister Strength
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+1 and is black.

card.name: Slay
card.property: Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

card.name: Volcano Imp
card.property: Flying {1}{R}: Volcano Imp gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Warped Devotion
card.property: Whenever a permanent is returned to a player's hand, that player discards a card.

card.name: Caldera Kavu
Deadapult
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice a Zombie: Deadapult deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Flametongue Kavu
card.property: When Flametongue Kavu enters, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Goblin Game
card.property: Each player hides at least one item, then all players reveal them simultaneously. Each player loses life equal to the number of items they revealed. The player who revealed the fewest items then loses half their life, rounded up. If two or more players are tied for fewest, each loses half their life, rounded up.

card.name: Implode
card.property: Destroy target land. Draw a card.

card.name: Insolence
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Insolence deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Kavu Recluse
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes a Forest until end of turn.

card.name: Keldon Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature {B}: Regenerate enchanted creature. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}: Enchanted creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Magma Burst
card.property: Kicker—Sacrifice two lands. (You may sacrifice two lands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Magma Burst deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 3 damage to another target.

card.name: Mire Kavu
card.property: Mire Kavu gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp.

card.name: Mogg Jailer
card.property: Mogg Jailer can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 2 or less.

card.name: Mogg Sentry
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Mogg Sentry gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Planeswalker's Fury
card.property: {3} {R}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. Planeswalker's Fury deals damage equal to that card's mana value to that player. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Singe
card.property: Singe deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature becomes black until end of turn.

card.name: Slingshot Goblin
card.property: {R}, {T}: Slingshot Goblin deals 2 damage to target blue creature.

card.name: Strafe
card.property: Strafe deals 3 damage to target nonred creature.

card.name: Tahngarth, Talruum Hero
card.property: Vigilance {1}{R}, {T}: Tahngarth, Talruum Hero deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Tahngarth.

card.name: Thunderscape Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {1}{B} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.) When Thunderscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, target player discards two cards. When Thunderscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {G} kicker, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Thunderscape Familiar
card.property: First strike Black spells and green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Alpha Kavu
card.property: {1} {G}: Target Kavu creature gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Amphibious Kavu
card.property: Whenever Amphibious Kavu blocks or becomes blocked by one or more blue and/or black creatures, Amphibious Kavu gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Falling Timber
card.property: Kicker—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn. If this spell was kicked, prevent all combat damage another target creature would deal this turn.

card.name: Gaea's Herald
card.property: Creature spells can't be countered.

card.name: Gaea's Might
card.property: Domain — Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

card.name: Magnigoth Treefolk
card.property: Domain — For each basic land type among lands you control, Magnigoth Treefolk has landwalk of that type. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

card.name: Mirrorwood Treefolk
Multani's Harmony
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Nemata, Grove Guardian
Planeswalker's Favor
card.property: {3} {G}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's mana value.

card.name: Primal Growth
card.property: Kicker—Sacrifice a creature. (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, instead search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Pygmy Kavu
card.property: When Pygmy Kavu enters, draw a card for each black creature your opponents control.

card.name: Quirion Dryad
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell that's white, blue, black, or red, put a +1/+1 counter on Quirion Dryad.

card.name: Quirion Explorer
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Root Greevil
card.property: {2} {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Root Greevil: Destroy all enchantments of the color of your choice.

card.name: Skyshroud Blessing
card.property: All lands gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) Draw a card.

card.name: Stone Kavu
card.property: {R}: Stone Kavu gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}: Stone Kavu gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Thornscape Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.) When Thornscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to any target. When Thornscape Battlemage enters, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Thornscape Familiar
card.property: Red spells and white spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Ancient Spider
card.property: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Cavern Harpy
card.property: Flying When Cavern Harpy enters, return a blue or black creature you control to its owner's hand. Pay 1 life: Return Cavern Harpy to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cloud Cover
card.property: Whenever another permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may return that permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Crosis's Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Darigaaz's Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Darigaaz's Charm deals 3 damage to any target. • Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Daring Leap
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Destructive Flow
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a nonbasic land of their choice.

card.name: Doomsday Specter
card.property: Flying When Doomsday Specter enters, return a blue or black creature you control to its owner's hand. Whenever Doomsday Specter deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand and choose a card from it. The player discards that card.

card.name: Dralnu's Crusade
card.property: All Goblins get +1/+1. All Goblins are black and are Zombies in addition to their other creature types.

card.name: Dromar's Charm
card.property: Choose one — • You gain 5 life. • Counter target spell. • Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Eladamri's Call
card.property: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Ertai, the Corrupted
card.property: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Counter target spell.

card.name: Fleetfoot Panther
card.property: Flash When Fleetfoot Panther enters, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gerrard's Command
card.property: Untap target creature. It gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Horned Kavu
card.property: When Horned Kavu enters, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Hull Breach
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

card.name: Keldon Twilight
card.property: At the beginning of each player's end step, if no creatures attacked this turn, that player sacrifices a creature of their choice that they controlled since the beginning of the turn.

card.name: Lava Zombie
card.property: When Lava Zombie enters, return a black or red creature you control to its owner's hand. {2}: Lava Zombie gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Malicious Advice
card.property: Tap X target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. You lose X life.

card.name: Marsh Crocodile
card.property: When Marsh Crocodile enters, return a blue or black creature you control to its owner's hand. When Marsh Crocodile enters, each player discards a card.

card.name: Meddling Mage
card.property: As Meddling Mage enters, choose a nonland card name. Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

card.name: Natural Emergence
card.property: When Natural Emergence enters, return a red or green enchantment you control to its owner's hand. Lands you control are 2/2 creatures with first strike. They're still lands.

card.name: Phyrexian Tyranny
card.property: Whenever a player draws a card, that player loses 2 life unless they pay {2}.

card.name: Questing Phelddagrif
card.property: {G}: Questing Phelddagrif gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target opponent creates a 1/1 green Hippo creature token. {W}: Questing Phelddagrif gains protection from black and from red until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life. {U}: Questing Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent may draw a card.

card.name: Radiant Kavu
Razing Snidd
card.property: When Razing Snidd enters, return a black or red creature you control to its owner's hand. When Razing Snidd enters, each player sacrifices a land of their choice.

card.name: Rith's Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target nonbasic land. • Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. • Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

card.name: Sawtooth Loon
card.property: Flying When Sawtooth Loon enters, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand. When Sawtooth Loon enters, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Shivan Wurm
card.property: Trample When Shivan Wurm enters, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Silver Drake
card.property: Flying When Silver Drake enters, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sparkcaster
card.property: When Sparkcaster enters, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand. When Sparkcaster enters, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Steel Leaf Paladin
card.property: First strike When Steel Leaf Paladin enters, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Terminate
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Treva's Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target attacking creature. • Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Urza's Guilt
card.property: Each player draws two cards, then discards three cards, then loses 4 life.

card.name: Draco
card.property: Domain — This spell costs {2} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control. Flying Domain — At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Draco unless you pay {10}. This cost is reduced by {2} for each basic land type among lands you control.

card.name: Mana Cylix
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Skyship Weatherlight
card.property: When Skyship Weatherlight enters, search your library for any number of artifact and/or creature cards, exile them, then shuffle. {4}, {T}: Choose a card at random that was exiled with Skyship Weatherlight. Put that card into its owner's hand.

card.name: Star Compass
card.property: Star Compass enters tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.

card.name: Stratadon
card.property: Domain — This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control. Trample

card.name: Crosis's Catacombs
card.property: When Crosis's Catacombs enters, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

card.name: Darigaaz's Caldera
card.property: When Darigaaz's Caldera enters, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

card.name: Dromar's Cavern
card.property: When Dromar's Cavern enters, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

card.name: Forsaken City
card.property: Forsaken City doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a card from your hand. If you do, untap Forsaken City. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Meteor Crater
card.property: {T}: Choose a color of a permanent you control. Add one mana of that color.

card.name: Rith's Grove
card.property: When Rith's Grove enters, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

card.name: Terminal Moraine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terminal Moraine: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Treva's Ruins
